venue.question: Where does the event take place?
venue.answer: The event takes place at Communauté Chrétienne du Point du Jour, 133 Rte de la Reine, 92100 Boulogne-Billancourt, France

transport.question: Do you organize transport for the event?
transport.answer: We do not organize transport, each participant organizes their own logistics.

accommodation.question: Where can I stay?
accommodation.answer: Accommodation options are available around the conference venue. We encourage you to use sites like booking.com or airbnb.com to find the solution that suits you.

food.question: Will I be able to buy food at the conference?
food.answer: There will be a fast food point at the conference. You will also find restaurants and supermarkets in the city.

program.question: What is the program?
program.answer: The days start at 9:00 AM and end around 10:00 PM. Breaks between sessions and for meals are planned. Since the program is constantly evolving until the last moment, we cannot provide details on the content or dates and times of the various speakers.

price.question: What is the price?
price.answer: The 4-day pass for one adult costs 60 euros until 31 August 2025, and 80 euros from 1 September 2025.

refund.question: I want to get a refund for my ticket, how does it work?
refund.answer: For any refund request, you must send an email to info@puentesparis2025.net from the email box that was used to purchase the tickets. You must specify the name, surname and order number. The refund will be made excluding the fees of the ticket purchasing platform which are non-refundable. No refund request will be accepted less than 15 days before the event.

video.question: Can the conference be followed by video remotely?
video.answer: Yes, the conference will be broadcast live on video in French and English, register here to receive the link.
